#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    double result,radius;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        double x = sqrt(2);
        scanf("%lf",&radius);
        result = ((2*radius)/x);
        printf("%lf\n",result);
    }

    return 0;
}
